text: Awa ndo wantu yawatenda pamuhera na mwenga mushiboga shenu sha ufiru pota kuwona soni. Womberi wawera gambira matalawu ga hatali gagaweza kugwamiziya mtumbwi na waweriti gambira walolera yawaliliziya weni hera na waweriti gambira mawundu yagahera mashi yagalonguziwa kwa liyega na waweriti gambira mitera yahera mabwajubwaju mushipindi sha kubena, yayitupulitwi na kufuwa nakamu,
